content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "append_to_file" command to add the text "Appended text." to the file "file_logger.txt". The command returned a message confirming that the text was appended successfully. Previously, I used the "list_files" command to get a list of files and directories in my current directory, which included "atlas.yaml", "average.py", "test_average.py", and various other files. I also used the "read_file" command to read the file "productive_things_to_do.txt", which contained a list of over 100 productive things to do when bored, an article on overcoming the planning fallacy, a personal account of following Benjamin Franklin's daily schedule, and promotion of a free time tracking software called Clockify.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "example.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: new text', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "delete_file", "args": {"filename": "example.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command delete_file returned: File deleted successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "replace_in_file", "args": {"filename": "example.txt", "old_text": "old text", "new_text": "new text", "occurrence_index": 0}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command replace_in_file returned: Error: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/example.txt'", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_code", "args": {"code": "print(\'Hello, World!\')", "basename": "hello_world.py"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_python_code returned: Hello, World!\n', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "ls -l"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb'total 604\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root      6 Jun 11 10:37 <filename>\\ndrwxr-xr-x 3 root root     27 Jun 11 10:10 Atlas\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root   1281 Jun 10 23:08 ai_code.py\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 546515 Jun 11 12:01 atlas.json\\n-rw-rw-r-- 1 1000 rvm     912 Jun 10 18:26 atlas.settings.yaml\\n-rw-rw-r-- 1 1000 rvm    1062 Jun 10 22:24 atlas.yaml\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root    550 Jun 11 12:02 automate_task.py\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root    241 Jun 11 00:30 average.py\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root    509 Jun 11 11:43 clockify_features.txt\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root    509 Jun 11 11:41 clockify_info.txt\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root    375 Jun 11 11:39 eisenhower_box_notes.txt\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root    450 Jun 11 09:58 featured_article.txt\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root   6661 Jun 11 12:04 file_logger.txt\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root    943 Jun 11 00:28 legal_research_resources.txt\\ndrwxr-xr-x 2 root root      6 Jun 11 00:41 my_folder\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root    403 Jun 11 11:40 productive_things_to_do.txt\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root    474 Jun 11 11:45 pumble_features.txt\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root    292 Jun 11 11:47 pumble_pricing.txt\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root    630 Jun 11 00:31 test_average.py\\n'\nSTDERR:\nb''", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', It also includes an article on overcoming the planning fallacy and a personal account of following Benjamin Franklin's daily schedule, as well as promoting a free time tracking software called Clockify.", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "append_to_file", "args": {"filename": "file_logger.txt", "text": "Appended text."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command append_to_file returned: Text appended successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "replace_in_file", "args": {"filename": "file_logger.txt", "old_text": "Appended text.", "new_text": "Replaced text.", "occurrence_index": 0}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command replace_in_file returned: File /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/file_logger.txt updated successfully.', type='action_result')]
"""
